body.name: Ayotu Anti-Theft Doorbell Mount with Charging Cable for Ring Doorbell Pro 2/Pro/Wried, Continuous Charging with No-Drill Mounting Door Bracket Adapter Holder (NOT Inculde Doorbell), Black
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 19 mins
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 16 hrs 19 mins
features: KEEP DOORBELL POWERD: This anti theft door mount use a 5V 2A power adapter with a 16ft/5m charging cable to quickly charge the doorbell, so you don't have to worry about low battery levels.
COMPATIBLE WITH DOOORBELL: This ring doorbell holder is compatible with Ring Video Doorbell Wired/Pro 2/Pro(NOT inluding doorbell).

ANTI-THEFT DOORBELL MOUNT: This high-quality mount replaces foam with a doorbell base plate that matches one-to-one, preventing the doorbell from moving and improving its security. No tools! No drill! No holes! No damage door!

WIDE DOOR APPLICATION: The doorbell camera holder for apartment doors, homes, schools, hotels, and other doors. Note: Before purchasing, confirm that your door's thickness ranges from 1.0 inches to 2.5 inches, and the door gap should be more than 0.06 inches.

PACKING LIST: 5V 2A Power Adapter, 16ft Charging Cable*1, Front Case*1, Bottom Plate*1, Metal Mounting Part with Charging Box*1, Iron Sheet*1 Handle Screws*2, Screws*20,Instruction*1. If you encounter any problems, you can always contact us and we will do our best to help you solve the problem.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mount With Charging Cable Anti-Theft Doorbell Mount keeps your Ring Video Doorbell Wired/Pro2/Pro safe from being stolen and continuous charging.

Previous page Doorbell Anti Theft Mount Keep Ring Video Doorbell Pro2/Pro/Wired Charged Charging Continuously!No frequent disassembly required!No frequent battery replacement needed! Ring Doorbell Holder One-to-one Doorbell Ring Base Plate Use a one-to-one doorbell baseplate instead of filling foam.Suitable! Sturdy! Durable! Non-moving! Doorbell Apartment Mount No Damage Door Use iron sheets to protect the door from damage.No tools! No holes!No damage Door! Apartment Doorbell Holder No Affect Motion Detection Function Not Affect Motion Function!No need to worry about the doorbell not detecting people's movement. Next page 1 Keep Doorbell Charging 2 Suitable Ring Doorbell 3 No Tools! No Holes! 4 No Affect Function

Doorbell included? No, the doorbell is not included. This is only the anti-theft door mount with charging cable kit. Can this anti-theft door mount charge the doorbell? Yes, this doorbell holder for apartment door is specially designed to charge Ring Video Doorbell Wired/Pro2/Pro with a 16ft charging cable. What kind of doors can use this anti-theft doorbell mount? Door thickness ranges：Form 1.0" to 2.5" (25mm to 65mm). Door gap is supposed to over 0.06" (1.6mm). Door flat length longer than 52.3" (132.6mm) Is this filled with sponge? No, it is specially tailored to be compatible with the backing of the doorbell, rather than filled with easily deformable sponge. Does it affect the motion detection function? No, the apartment door holder does not block the motion detection function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Going on the door to my backyard shop building
reviews.reviewText: I am experienced with Ring doorbells, and I want to add one to the door of my backyard building which is my wood shop. This theft-proof product will make that possible at last. This product looks to be quite strong, and the anti-theft features are well thought out. I really like the provision for easily hardwiring the Ring doorbell so that I will not need to be recharging a battery every month or so. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a rental
reviews.reviewText: Perfect solution to using a Ring doorbell at my apartment. Power cord was a great length and all that too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In addition to being used at homes, it can also be used at vacation rentals, offices etc.
reviews.reviewText: Whether I’m at home, at work or on vacation, I am always thinking about safety. After retiring from a 26 year law enforcement career, I can say that I have seen a lot of innocent people become victims of crimes, with many of those crimes being preventable. I have a Ring doorbell camera permanently mounted onto my front door, and was going to add another Ring doorbell to my back door with the same screw-in permanent mount, until I saw this product. I really like that it does not require any holes. What I also like is that I can take this mount, along with a Ring doorbell and use it at the beach house that we rent every year. There’s no reason to let my guard down just because I’m on vacation.This is a well designed and made product and it should last for several years. Installing it was super easy. The mount does not leave any marks on the door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great concept, poor execution
reviews.reviewText: Don’t recommend, the charging of the camera was not working

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the idea of this mount. it fits the door cam securely onto your door. it doesn't block any sensor. and you can easily charge your device with this. the only thing I didn't like is the lock screw or whatever it's called. it's too long. they should include a shorter one. but other than that. this is a great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great buy
reviews.reviewText: This item was missing a piece to ensure the ability to use the charging part of this and we had to order that when we realized it wasn’t there. It was only $8 but it’s worth noting. I like this and I am glad to have purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is cool
reviews.reviewText: This thing is really cool! Sometimes you don’t want to drill holes and things like thatMy favorite feature has to be the charging cable!This thing is great for my apartment since I’m renting and I can still protect my home and the ring camera itself 🙂👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm in an apartment currently and I saw someone use the ring system with an attachment like this. I haven't used it yet but I plan on using it once I buy the ring doorbell. It is very sturdy and secure
